simd_packed_half16 Type Aliassimd_packed_half16typealias simd_packed_half16 = SIMD16<Float16>DiscussionA vector of sixteen 16-bit floating-point numbers with relaxed alignment.

This type is not available in Metal. The alignment of this type is only that of the underlying scalar element type, so you can use it to load or store from an array of that type.

# simd_packed_half16 | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ simd ](/documentation/simd)

Type Alias# simd_packed_half16



```
typealias simd_packed_half16 = SIMD16<Float16>
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_packed_half16#discussion)

A vector of sixteen 16-bit floating-point numbers with relaxed alignment.

This type is not available in Metal. The alignment of this type is only that of the underlying scalar element type, so you can use it to load or store from an array of that type.
